name: English Language Acquisition State Grants
objective: To help ensure that English learners (ELs), including immigrant children and youth, attain English proficiency and meet the same challenging State academic standards that all children are expected to meet.
sub_agency_name: Office of Elementary and Secondary Education
applicant_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (ESEA), as amended, Title III, Part A, Sections 3101-3131.
